comment.author: 12701328@N00
comment._content:
I think this is a picture of John Burke, on the right, who was the 10th Governor of North Dakota.  He was Governor from 1907 to 1913.  He was also the Secretary of the Treasury under Woodrow Wilson (1913-1921).
(CoryQ)

comment.author: 40621442@N00
comment._content: guitar player and bassist for the little-known 1910 rock band "men with hats"

comment.author: 66944833@N00
comment._content: later broke up and formed"the bolo hat boys"

comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: Burke was not the governor of Montana, here is a list of those: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Governors_of_Montana

comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: In addition to his three terms as Governor of North Dakota, Burke also served as a Justice of the North Dakota Supreme Court from 1924 until 1937, and was twice Chief Justice. There is a brief biography of John Burke on the University of North Dakota website.
